name: Mirador de San Nicolas in Granada
description: The most iconic viewpoint in Granada (Spain), which offers its visitors a fantastic view to the two most emblematic symbols of this beautiful town: the Alhambra, a wonderful muslim castle, and the Veleta, the second highest peak in the mountain range of Sierra Nevada. It offers a complete view of the Alhambra, the Sierra Nevada and the city of Granada. Former U.S. President Bill Clinton once coined it â€œthe most breathtaking sunset in the world
